references: Amending: Ord 38045. Repealing: Ord 52543, Ord 54949. Related: CF 150493
summary: An ordinance relating to and regulating the use of occupation of public places within the City; providing for the issuance of permits by the Board of Public Works; amending Section 9 of Ordinance 38045 (as amended), and repealing Ordinances Nos. 52543 and 54949.
